post.body:
Enjoying some Akira Vol. 1 on:

1+Gallery viewer (http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/)

and the sadMangaHub gallery (http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GjnbpR9vCkDaiSunEXEQX8WtGC7Tmc3Cw/).

Pro-tips: 

Space to go down, at bottom of page; space to go to next page. (Thanks Ansho Rei!)

Don't go "fullscreen mode" in the zite but zoom in until it fills the browser window, then go fullscreen in your browser! (Usually F11).

Each pane is it's own page so bookmark it in the browser when you're done to continue where you left off later.

@Ansho Rei: I want to create a new galleryhub to upload images to share on ZeroTalk etc. When I press the "Create New Hub" in the "Hubs" tab of 1+Gallery, nothing happens. Tested on TOR Browser and Brave (Chromium based). Any tips?

comment.body: @Dfp3v: Unfortunately I'm only getting a grey page when trying to open the comics on this zite...

@Pexo: Tried following your link (after a cleanup, removed the me.zeronetwork.bit-part...) and it took me to a site that quickly redirected me to 1+gallery. When I pressed the "New Hub" button I got an error message telling me that zite is still syncing, so at least somethings happening now.

I'll try again once it's done syncing, thanks for the help so far!

@Pexo: It worked great! Woo
@Ansho Rei: I suggest changing "GalleryHub+ Demo" link in the hub tab to "GalleryHub+ Demo (Required to create galleries)"
